steps.title: Feel the Field
steps.description: Scan and assess the client's biofield, identifying energetic blockages, density, and flow patterns

steps.title: Locate the Block
steps.description: Pinpoint where energy is stagnant, leaking, or disrupted using the 7-chakra and meridian mapping system

steps.title: Open the Channel
steps.description: Use hands-on and distance healing techniques to release blockages and restore energetic flow

steps.title: Witness the Shift
steps.description: Guide the client to integrate the session, anchor the new energy pattern, and track transformation

sarah.storySnippet: I'm Sarah. For years, I felt energy in my hands ‚Äî tingling, warmth, a pull toward healing. When I finally learned to channel it professionally, my entire life transformed.

examQuestions.question: Which system maps the body's 7 primary energy centers?
examQuestions.explanation: The 7 chakra system maps the body's primary energy centers from the root (base of spine) to the crown (top of head).

examQuestions.question: What is the scope of practice for an energy healing practitioner?
options: Facilitating energetic wellness to complement conventional care
examQuestions.explanation: Energy healers facilitate energetic wellness and complement ‚Äî never replace ‚Äî conventional medical care.

examQuestions.question: In the F.L.O.W. Method‚Ñ¢, what does the 'L' stand for?
examQuestions.explanation: The 'L' stands for Locate ‚Äî pinpointing where energy is stagnant or disrupted using the 7-chakra and meridian map.

examQuestions.question: What is the correct order of the F.L.O.W. Method‚Ñ¢ steps?

watching-others.quote: I kept seeing other women become energy healers. I finally said enough waiting.
watching-others.name: Jen, 42

feeling-stuck.quote: Every time I ignored the pull toward healing work, something inside me dimmed. Starting was everything.

lost-myself.quote: I was so disconnected from my own energy. Learning to heal others helped me heal myself first.

zombie.name: Maya
zombie.backstory: Former massage therapist who always felt there was a deeper layer to healing. 'When I put my hands on a client, I felt things ‚Äî heat, tingling, cold spots. I thought everyone could feel that. Turns out, I was channeling energy without knowing it.'
zombie.transformation: From a 'burnt-out massage therapist who felt everything but couldn't explain it' ‚Üí Certified energy healer making $4,800/month using the F.L.O.W. Method with 10 regular clients
zombie.incomeStory: $4,800/month working 12 hours/week. Started offering energy sessions to 3 former massage clients. Word spread through yoga studios.

faqItems.question: Do I need to be psychic or gifted?
faqItems.answer: No. Energy sensitivity can be developed. Most of our graduates started with nothing more than a feeling that 'there's more to healing than what I see.'

faqItems.question: Is this Reiki?
faqItems.answer: Energy healing is a broader field that includes Reiki but also encompasses chakra balancing, biofield therapy, and meridian work. This diploma covers the full spectrum.

faqItems.question: Can I really make money doing this?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Our graduates charge $100‚Äì$250 per session. With 5‚Äì10 clients per week, that's $3,000‚Äì$8,000/month part-time.
